tool_description: Extracts and analyzes content features from book descriptions, reviews, and metadata to create feature vectors for similarity matching.

book_descriptions.description: List of book descriptions or summaries

book_titles.description: Corresponding book titles for the descriptions

additional_text.description: Additional text like reviews or excerpts

feature_types.description: Types of features to extract: themes, mood, complexity, length, characters

analysis_language.description: Language for text analysis: english, spanish, french, german

extract_keywords.description: Whether to extract key themes and topics

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: book_descriptions and book_titles must have the same length.
Invalid feature types: Use combinations of [themes, mood, complexity, length, characters].
Unsupported language: Use one of [english, spanish, french, german].
Empty descriptions: All book descriptions must contain meaningful text.
Text too long: Individual descriptions should be under 5000 characters.
Processing error: Failed to extract features from one or more descriptions.
usage: Provide book_descriptions and book_titles arrays. Optionally include additional_text, specify feature_types, analysis_language, and enable extract_keywords or sentiment_analysis. Returns content feature vectors.

extracted_themes.description: List of main themes found across books

mood_scores.description: Mood/sentiment scores for each book (-1 to 1 scale)

feature_vectors.description: Numerical feature vectors for similarity calculations
